creator: egli@apache.org
text:
The oscom pub fails with an exception:
An Error Occurredorg.apache.cocoon.ProcessingExceptionUnable to get transformer
handler for xslt/home/authoring/main.xslorg.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException:
Unable to get transformer handler for xslt/home/authoring/main.xsl:
org.apache.excalibur.xml.xslt.XSLTProcessorException: Exception in creating
Transform Handlerorg.apache.excalibur.xml.xslt.XSLTProcessorException: Unable to
create templates for stylesheet:
file:/home/egli/build/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.29/webapps/lenya/lenya/pubs/oscom/xslt/home/authoring/main.xslOriginal
Exception: org.apache.excalibur.xml.xslt.XSLTProcessorException: Exception in
creating Transform Handler

This probably has to do with the changes in the xlink processor

creator: egli@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 9443
full stacktrace of exception

Fixed XInclude processor which had been broken a couple of days ago and made the
oscom pub fail. Should work now.
creator: michi@apache.org
